product_name: K2 Sendit Boa Snowboard Boots - Women's - 2012/2013
long_description: With simple, clean styling, the K2 Sendit Boa Snowboard boots feature a dialed-in fit and amazing comfort at a price that won't break the bank. Comfort Foam liners offer a superior out-of-box feel; external J-bars deliver heel hold and 3D liner bottom is designed to work with any foot shape or insole. Fast-In(TM) single-pull liner lacing system keeps feet locked in place. EVA insoles offer cushioned support to combat foot fatigue. Boa(R) standard lacing system, with ankle and cable guides along entire edge of eyestays, distributes closure force evenly for a dialed-in fit that won't loosen up. Low-Profile rubber outsoles offer traction on snow- and ice-covered terrain.
short_description: With simple, clean styling, the K2 Sendit Boa Snowboard boots feature a dialed-in fit and amazing comfort at a price that won't break the bank.
